A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At first viewing\, this film is a lot to digest if you're a Star Wars fan. If you're willing to accept its messages and big changes\, then it becomes a compelling and invigorating entry into the mythos. Each and every character arc is meticulously constructed and executed to Johnson's vision. The performances are all stellar (this may be Hamill's best performance as Skywalker)\, but chief among them is Driver's Kylo Ren.
